note: 探索Mac的世界。查看MacBook Pro、iMac Pro、MacBook Air、iMac等。访问苹果网站了解、购买和获得支持。
note_en: Explore the world of Mac. Check out MacBook Pro, iMac Pro, MacBook Air, iMac, and more. Visit the Apple site to learn, buy, and get support.
title: 配备M1芯片的新款Apple Mac
title_en: New Apple Mac's with M1 Chip

note: M1在这里。我们的第一款芯片是专门为Mac设计的，它提供令人难以置信的性能、定制技术和革命性的能效。而且它从一开始就是为了与世界上最先进的桌面操作系统MacOS和Big Sur配合使用而设计的。随着每瓦性能的巨大飞跃，每台配备M1的Mac电脑都转变成了完全不同的产品类别。这不是升级。这是一个重大突破。
note_en: M1 is here. Our first chip designed specifically for Mac, it delivers incredible performance, custom technologies, and revolutionary power efficiency. And it was designed from the very start to work with the most advanced desktop operating system in the world, macOS Big Sur. With a giant leap in performance per watt, every Mac with M1 is transformed into a completely different class of product. This isn’t an upgrade. It’s a breakthrough.
title: 苹果M1

note:
苹果公司今天发布了第一款用于Mac的苹果硅处理器，名为M1芯片。M1针对优先考虑小型化和能效的Mac系统进行了优化。
M1芯片有一个八核CPU，有四个高性能内核，苹果称之为世界上最快的CPU内核。其他四个内核都是高效率的内核，耗电量只有它的十分之一，同时还能提供高性能。苹果公司表示，M1提供了最佳的CPU性能功耗比。
M1的显卡集成了多达8个内核的GPU，苹果公司表示，M1集成显卡的速度是世界上最快的。该芯片还包含一个每秒可处理11万亿次运算的六核神经引擎，以及苹果的安全飞地。
M1也采用与A14仿生芯片相同的5纳米制程，支持迅雷和USB4。
这篇报道是我们今天对苹果正在进行的另一件事的报道的一部分。请刷新以获取更多详细信息，并关注我们的现场博客以获取最新更新。我们还在推特上直播了这一活动。
我迫不及待地想看看一些声明在测试中是如何堆积起来的。
未发布的Mac电脑Geekbase5配备了A14X(这意味着它很可能是M1)，在单核和多核上都比16 MBP的8核i9更高。
很好，称它为A14是愚蠢的，而且每年新iPhone发布时都会让Mac电脑感觉超时
我迫不及待地想看看一些声明在测试中是如何堆积起来的。
我想他们可能会这么做，即使M已经用于iPhone和iPad的动画协处理器。
苹果公司今天推出了一个新的iPhone12工作室页面，可以通过iPhone和iPad等移动设备在网络上访问。在这个页面上，你可以定制带有各种MagSafe保护套和钱包的iPhone 12机型，看看颜色组合是什么样子。加载页面后，第一步是选择iPhone 12 mini、iPhone 12、iPhone 12 Pro或iPhone 12 Pro Max。然后，您可以向下滚动到...。
汤森路透国际证券(TF International Securities)分析师郭明志发布了一份新的研究报告，MacRumors看到了这份报告。报告详细说明了他对明年iPhone产品线(暂定名称为iPhone 13)的预期，其中包括一些基于多个因素的积极出货量预测。据郭说，iPhone13将有和今年的iPhone12相同的四个型号的尺寸，但有一些主要的.。
IPhone 12 Mini和iPhone 12 Pro Max今天早上刚刚开始预订，但一些下单的顾客已经看到这些订单变成了准备发货的状态。准备发货的订单不能再被取消，很快就可以使用UPS My Choice和Track by Reference Number in United…等方法追踪这些订单。
苹果公司今天发布了iOS 14.2和iPadOS 14.2，这是9月份发布的iOS和iPadOS 14操作系统更新的第二次重大更新。IOS 14.2和iPadOS 14.2是在iOS 14.1发布两周后发布的。IOS 14.2更新可以免费下载，所有符合条件的设备都可以通过设置应用程序进行无线下载。要访问新软件，请转到设置&gt；...。
在测试新款iPhone的摄像头功能时，摄影师奥斯汀·曼的详细评论是首屈一指的。IPhone 12 Pro Max的评论今天早上上线了，曼恩的深度摄像头测试现在也可以使用了。对于任何对iPhone12 Pro Max摄像头感兴趣的人来说，曼恩的评论都是必读的评论，因为这是苹果公司一段时间以来的第一次……。
在iPhone 12 Mini和iPhone 12 Pro Max于周五发布之前，苹果的禁令解除了对这两款产品的评论。除了我们更详细的评论综述之外，我们还收集了一些拆箱视频和对以下设备的评论。此外，还有苹果即将推出的MagSafe充电器和皮革袖子配件的拆箱视频。图片：安德鲁·爱德华兹第一件事……
自9月份以来，我们几乎都无法从苹果的新闻中喘一口气。本周，苹果公司也不例外，宣布将于11月10日(下周二)举行另一场虚拟活动，并启动iPhone 12 mini、iPhone 12 Pro Max和HomePod mini的预订。此外，本周iOS14.2发布了一些新的表情符号，对讲机功能，以及额外的……。
今天，被称为端瑞的泄密者在中文网站52dio上分享了似乎是重新设计的第三代AirPods的图片。根据图片附带的翻译文字，第一张图片据说描绘了一个单一的耳机外壳和充电驾驶舱外壳。与第一代和第二代AirPods相比，耳塞本身似乎完全重新设计了……。
苹果上个月推出了MagSafe二人组充电器，其特点是内置了MagSafe充电器和Apple Watch充电盘的可折叠设计。最近在Instagram上分享的一段新视频亲手制作了这个配饰。在Instagram上查看这篇文章，苹果的MagSafe充电器二人组很快就会有129美元的价格。我更喜欢购买即将发布的空中力量。什么.。
对于那些仍在试图在iPhone 12和iPhone 12 Pro之间做出选择的人，我们选择了这两种型号，并在我们最新的YouTube视频中对它们进行了亲身体验的比较。我们的视频突出了其中的相似之处和不同之处，这样你就可以知道哪一款最适合你，以及iPhone12 Pro是否值额外的200美元。订阅MacRumors YouTube频道了解更多...
note_en:
Apple has today  announced the first  Apple Silicon processor for the Mac titled the "M1" chip. The M1 is optimized for Mac systems in which prioritize small size and power efficiency.
  The M1 chip has an eight-core CPU, with four high-performance cores, in what Apple calls "the world's fastest CPU core." The other four cores are high-efficiency cores that use one-tenth of the power while still delivering high performance. Apple says that M1 delivers the best CPU performance per watt.
  The M1 has integrated graphics with GPU containing up to eight cores, and Apple says the M1 contains the world's fastest integrated graphics. The chip also contains a six-core neural engine that can process 11 trillion operations per second, as well as Apple's Secure Enclave.
 M1 is also built on the same five-nanometer process as the A14 Bionic chip, and supports Thunderbolt and USB 4.
 This story is part of our coverage of Apple's ongoing "One More Thing" event today. Refresh for more details and  follow along with our live blog for the latest updates. We're also live  tweeting the event on Twitter.
 I can't wait to see how some of the claims stack up in in testing.
Geekbench 5 of an unreleased Mac with an A14X (which means it was likely an M1) benched higher on single and multi core than the 8-core i9 in the 16" MBP.
 good, calling it the A14 would have been stupid and make Macs feel super dated every year when a new iPhone comes out
  I can't wait to see how some of the claims stack up in in testing.
 Thought they might do this, even if M has been used for Motion Coprocessors in the iPhone and iPad.
  Apple today launched a new iPhone 12 Studio page, accessible on the web on mobile devices like the iPhone and iPad. The page allows you to customize iPhone 12 models with various MagSafe cases and wallets to see how the color combinations look.After loading the page, the first step is to choose the iPhone 12 mini, iPhone 12, iPhone 12 Pro, or iPhone 12 Pro Max. Then, you can scroll down to...
 TF International Securities analyst Ming-Chi Kuo has released a new research note, seen by MacRumors, that details his expectations for next year's iPhone lineup, tentatively dubbed "iPhone 13," including some positive shipment predictions based on a number of factors.According to Kuo, the iPhone 13 will come in the same four model sizes as this year's iPhone 12, but with some major...
 iPhone 12 Mini and iPhone 12 Pro Max pre-orders just went live this morning, but some customers who placed orders are already seeing those orders shift over to the "preparing to ship" status.Orders that are preparing to ship are no longer able to be canceled, and soon those orders should be able to be tracked using methods like UPS My Choice and track by reference number in the United...
 Apple today released iOS 14.2 and iPadOS 14.2, the second major updates to the iOS and iPadOS 14 operating system updates that were released in September. iOS 14.2 and iPadOS 14.2 come two weeks after the launch of iOS 14.1.The iOS 14.2 update can be downloaded for free and it is available on all eligible devices over-the-air in the Settings app. To access the new software, go to Settings >...
 When it comes to testing the camera features in new iPhone models, photographer Austin Mann's detailed reviews are second to none. iPhone 12 Pro Max reviews went live this morning, and Mann's in-depth camera test is also now available.Mann's review a must-read review for anyone who is interested in the iPhone 12 Pro Max for its camera, because this is the first year in some time that Apple...
 Apple's embargo has lifted on reviews for the iPhone 12 mini and iPhone 12 Pro Max ahead of the devices launching on Friday. In addition to our more detailed review roundups, we've gathered a handful of unboxing videos and reviews of the devices below. There are also unboxing videos for Apple's upcoming MagSafe Duo Charger and Leather Sleeve accessories.Image: Andru Edwards The first thing...
 It feels like we've barely been able to catch our breath from Apple news since September, and this week was no exception with Apple announcing yet another virtual event for next Tuesday, November 10, and launching pre-orders for the iPhone 12 mini, iPhone 12 Pro Max, and HomePod mini.In addition, this week saw the launch of iOS 14.2 with some new emoji, an Intercom feature, and additional ...
 Leaker known as "DuanRui" has today shared images from Chinese site 52audio of what appears to be redesigned third-generation AirPods.According to translated text that accompanied the images, the first image supposedly depicts a single "earphone shell" and the "charging cockpit shell." The earbud itself seems to be completely redesigned compared to the first and second-generation AirPods, ...
 Apple last month introduced the MagSafe Duo Charger, which features a foldable design with a built-in MagSafe Charger and Apple Watch charging puck. A new video recently shared on Instagram goes hands-on with the accessory. View this post on Instagram Apple’s MagSafe Charger Duo will soon be available for $129. I prefer to buy AirPower once that will be released. What ...
 For those still trying to make a decision between an iPhone 12 or an iPhone 12 Pro, we picked up both models and in our latest YouTube video, did a hands-on comparison between them. Our video highlights the similarities and the differences so you can which one is the best fit for you and whether the iPhone 12 Pro is worth an extra $200.Subscribe to the MacRumors YouTube channel for more ...
title: 苹果发布用于Mac的M1芯片
title_en: Apple Announces M1 Chip for the Mac

note:
在今天的“还有一件事”发布会上，苹果公司正式发布了一款全新的MacBook Air，由苹果硅片驱动。新款MacBook Air是苹果首款采用内部处理器(而非英特尔)驱动的笔记本电脑。下面是新款MacBook Air的实时更新。
新MacBook Air中的苹果硅片是一次重大升级，带来了更高的性能、电池续航时间和效率。这些都是苹果在今天的发布会上强调的改进之处。新款MacBook Air搭载苹果M1处理器，电池续航时间长达18小时。
请关注我们的Apple Event News Hub，了解今天的所有最新新闻，包括有关Apple Silicon的更多详细信息。
你正在阅读朝九晚五的Mac--日复一日发布苹果及其周边生态系统新闻的专家。请务必查看我们的主页以获取所有最新消息，并在Twitter、Facebook和LinkedIn上关注9to5Mac以保持最新消息。不知从何说起？查看我们的独家报道、评论、操作指南，并订阅我们的YouTube频道
note_en:
During its “One more thing” event today, Apple has officially announced an all-new MacBook Air powered by Apple Silicon. The new MacBook Air is Apple’s first laptop to be powered by in-house processors rather than Intel. Head below for live updates on the new MacBook Air.
  Apple Silicon in the new MacBook Air is a major upgrade, bringing improved performance, battery life, and efficiency. These are the improvements that Apple is emphasizing during its event today. The new MacBook Air is  powered by Apple’s M1 processor and features up to 18 hours of battery life.
   Follow along in our  Apple Event News Hub for all of the latest news today, including additional details on Apple Silicon and more.
  You’re reading 9to5Mac — experts who break news about Apple and its surrounding ecosystem, day after day. Be sure to check out  our homepage for all the latest news, and follow 9to5Mac on  Twitter,  Facebook, and  LinkedIn to stay in the loop. Don’t know where to start? Check out our  exclusive stories,  reviews,  how-tos, and  subscribe to our YouTube channel
title: 苹果推出搭载Apple Silicon M1芯片的全新MacBook Air
title_en: Apple unveils all-new MacBook Air powered by Apple Silicon M1 chip

note:
苹果宣布推出2020款MacBook Air。它由苹果最新的M1处理器驱动。这是第一款MacBook Air，也是首批配备苹果ARM处理器的笔记本电脑之一。
八核M1是一款基于A14仿生芯片的5纳米处理器，A14仿生芯片组为iPhone 12和iPad Air系列提供动力。苹果公司表示，M1包含四个世界上速度最快的CPU核心，配上四个高效率的核心-这是为了平衡性能和效率。该公司还声称，该芯片在所有CPU中提供了世界上最好的每瓦性能。
苹果公司表示，新款Air的速度比“去年销售的98%的个人电脑笔记本电脑”都要快。它的速度比英特尔MacBook Air快3.5倍，图形性能比英特尔快5倍，机器学习速度比英特尔快9倍。
苹果公司还声称，你只需付费就可以享受15小时的网页浏览和18小时的视频播放。(如果这一说法站得住脚，这将是对英特尔支持的MacBook Air的改进。)。里面没有风扇，所以它也应该运行得无声。
在规格方面，新款Air配备了13.3英寸的视网膜显示屏，支持P3宽色域，最高可达16 GB的内存和2TB的存储空间。它支持迅雷、USB 4、Wi-Fi 6和Touch ID。
此次发布是苹果摆脱英特尔处理器的第一步，苹果电脑自2005年以来一直使用英特尔处理器。该公司预计这一过程需要两年时间。
苹果声称，这些芯片将提供比英特尔竞争对手更好的性能和能效。但ARM系统最大的优势在于，它们将能够在MacOS上本地运行iOS和iPadOS应用程序。至于MacOS应用程序：苹果已经更新了自己的程序，如Pages、Numbers和Keynote，以支持其硅片，微软(Microsoft)和Adobe等其他大公司也是如此。在6月份的发布会上，苹果展示了Lightroom和Photoshop在其新款Mac上的流畅运行-Lightroom定于下月发布，Photoshop将于明年初发布。Air将运行的MacOS Big Sur包括一个名为Rosetta 2的仿真器，它将在发布时“翻译”任何尚未更新为ARM的应用程序。
新款MacBook Air的起价为999美元，教育起价为899美元。这使得它的价格与3月份发布的前一款MacBook Air相同。下周就可以买到，不过你可以今天预订。
正在开发的…。我们在这篇文章中添加了更多内容，但你可以关注我们的苹果“还有一件事”直播博客，以更快的速度获取新闻。
note_en:
Apple has announced the launch of its 2020 MacBook Air. It’s powered by Apple’s new M1 processor. This is the first MacBook Air, and one of the first laptops, to feature Apple’s own Arm-based CPUs.
 The  eight-core M1 is a 5nm processor based on the A14 Bionic, the chipset that powers the iPhone 12 and iPad Air lines. Apple stated that the M1 contains four of the world’s fastest CPU cores, paired with four high-efficiency cores — an effort to balance performance with efficiency. It also claims that the chip offers the world’s best performance per watt of any CPU.
 Apple says the new Air is faster than “98 percent of PC laptops sold in the last year.” It’s also up to 3.5 times faster than the Intel MacBook Air, with up to five times faster graphics performance and nine times faster machine learning, per the company.
 Apple also claims you’ll get 15 hours of web browsing and 18 hours of video playback to a charge. (If that claim holds up, it would be an improvement from the Intel-powered MacBook Air.) There’s no fan inside, so it should run noiselessly as well.
 In terms of specs, the new Air comes with a 13.3-inch retina display with P3 wide color gamut support, and up to 16GB of memory and 2TB of storage. It supports Thunderbolt, USB 4, Wi-Fi 6, and Touch ID.
 The release is the first step in Apple’s transition away from Intel processors, which Apple’s computers have used since 2005. The company expects the process to take two years.
  Apple claims the chips will deliver better performance and power efficiency than its Intel competitors. But the biggest advantage of Arm systems is that they’ll be able to run iOS and iPadOS apps natively on macOS. As for macOS apps: Apple has updated its own programs, such as Pages, Numbers, and Keynote, to support its silicon, as have other major companies like Microsoft and Adobe. At its June event, Apple demonstrated Lightroom and Photoshop running smoothly on its new Macs — Lightroom is slated for release next month, and Photoshop early next year. And macOS Big Sur, which the Air will run, includes an emulator called Rosetta 2 that will “translate” any apps that haven’t yet been updated for Arm at launch.
 The new MacBook Air starts at $999, and $899 for education. That makes it the same price as the previous MacBook Air, released in March. It’s available next week, but you can preorder it today.
  Developing… we’re adding more to this post, but you can follow along with our   Apple “One More Thing” live blog  to get the news even faster.
title: 苹果发布搭载基于ARM的M1处理器的MacBook Air
title_en: Apple Announces MacBook Air with Apple’s Arm-Based M1 Processor

note:
新的M1芯片配备了令人震惊的160亿个晶体管，将CPU、GPU、神经引擎、I/O等更多功能集成到一个微小的芯片上。与全新MacOS的Big Ssur相结合，M1提供了令人惊叹的速度、令人费解的图形，以及令人难以置信的能效和电池寿命。
我们最薄、最轻的笔记本，由M1芯片增压。强大的苹果CPU。更高级别的图形。静音、无风扇设计，电池续航时间长达18小时。
M1芯片搭载在MacBook Pro上。带来更大的能量。令人难以置信的图形。一个先进的神经引擎，用于增强机器学习。超快的统一内存。以及长达20小时的电池续航时间-这是苹果Mac有史以来最长的电池续航时间。
M1芯片使Mac mini更上一层楼。令人难以置信的性能、快速的显卡、超快的统一内存和强大的神经引擎为我们最多功能、万能的台式机带来了前所未有的能力。
note_en:
Packed with an astonishing 16 billion transistors, the new M1 chip integrates the CPU, GPU, Neural Engine, I/O, and so much more onto a single tiny chip. Combined with the new macOS Big Sur, M1 delivers category-smashing speed, mind-bending graphics, and power efficiency and battery life that defy belief.
  Our thinnest, lightest notebook, supercharged by the M1 chip. A powerful Apple CPU. Next-level graphics. A silent, fanless design with up to 18 hours of battery life.
  The M1 chip comes to MacBook Pro. Bringing far more power. Incredible graphics. An advanced Neural Engine for enhanced machine learning. Superfast unified memory. And up to 20 hours of battery life — the longest-ever battery life in a Mac.
  The M1 chip takes Mac mini to the next level. Incredible performance, speedy graphics, superfast unified memory, and a powerful Neural Engine bring unprecedented capability to our most versatile, do-it-all desktop.
title: 苹果发布会，2020年11月10日

note:
周二，苹果发布了一款新的Mac mini，这是自2018年以来的第一款，采用了新的定制设计的基于ARM的M1芯片，加入了新的MacBook Air，成为苹果在“再来一件事”(One More Thing)活动上发布的第二款苹果硅设备。新台式机的起价为699美元，比两年前发布的Mac mini便宜100美元。
苹果公司声称，多亏了M1芯片，新的Mac mini的能效提高了60%。该公司还声称，这款设备拥有“3倍快的CPU”和“6倍的显卡”，可选配高达16 GB的RAM和高达2TB的固态存储。苹果公司表示，这款机型最多可以支持两个外置显示屏，以及6K显示屏，显示屏端口选项包括迅雷和USB 4。尽管新款Mac mini的迅雷端口比2018年基于英特尔的机型少了两个，但值得注意的是，这款机型比2018年的英特尔机型少了两个迅雷端口。
苹果公司声称，得益于M1芯片，新款Mac mini可以比前一代产品更快地完成多项任务，包括：

今年6月，苹果公司在今年的WWDC大会上宣布了传言已久的这一转变，首席执行官蒂姆·库克称赞这一转变是“Mac电脑历史性的一天”。这并不夸张：从英特尔芯片转向基于ARM的Mac是该公司历史上最重要的产品决策之一，它将对更广泛的科技行业以及MacOS、iOS和iPadOS生态系统产生重大而持久的影响。
彭博社(Bloomberg)上周在发布会前报道，Mac mini只是据信正在研发的整个基于M1的台式机系列中的第一款，包括一款新的iMac和可能更小的Mac Pro版本。
note_en:
Apple on Tuesday announced a new Mac mini, the first since 2018, featuring its new  custom-designed Arm-based M1 chip, joining the  new MacBook Air as the second Apple Silicon device announced at the company’s “One More Thing” event. The new desktop machine will start at $699, $100 cheaper than the previously released Mac mini from two years ago.
 Apple claims the new Mac mini is up to 60 percent more energy efficient, thanks to the M1 chip. The company also claims the device has a “3x faster CPU” and “6x faster graphics,” with options for up to 16GB of RAM and up to 2TB of solid state storage. Apple says the machine can support up to two external displays, as well as a 6K display, with display port options including Thunderbolt and USB 4. Although the new Mac mini notably features two less Thunderbolt ports than the 2018 Intel-based model.
  Apple claims the new Mac mini, thanks to the M1 chip, can  perform a number of tasks faster than its predecessor, including:
 
 The shift to its own custom processors was hailed by CEO Tim Cook as a “historic day for the Mac” back when the company  announced the long-rumored transition at this year’s WWDC in June. And that’s not hyperbole: the shift to Arm-based Macs and away from Intel chips is among the most consequential product decisions in the company’s history, and it will have significant and long-lasting effects on both the broader tech industry and the macOS, iOS, and iPadOS ecosystems.
 The Mac mini is just the first of what’s believed to be an  entire line of M1-based desktop machines in the works, including a new iMac and a potentially smaller version of the Mac Pro,   Bloomberg reported ahead of the event last week.
title: 苹果宣布推出搭载M1芯片的基于ARM的新款Mac mini，起价699美元
title_en: Apple announces new Arm-based Mac mini with M1 chip starting at $699

note:
这篇报道是苹果发布会的一部分，我们对苹果总部的最新消息进行了全面报道。苹果的下一代Mac将使用一种名为M1的新芯片，这是其iPhone 12中A系列芯片的老大哥，苹果表示，这将为其个人电脑带来新的动力和电池续航时间。
苹果负责硬件技术的高级副总裁约翰尼·斯劳吉周二在苹果发布会发布会上表示，该公司研发该芯片的目标是拥有业界领先的性能和功能，同时坚持不懈地专注于性能效率。
为我们的编辑订阅CNET Now时事通讯，精选当天最重要的新闻。
在MacBook Air中，M1的电池续航时间长达15小时，用于网页浏览和18小时的视频播放。苹果公司表示，处理器速度比之前基于英特尔的机型快3.5倍，显卡速度快5倍。苹果公司表示，新款13英寸MacBook Pro的速度比最畅销的英特尔电脑快3倍。
该处理器拥有160亿个晶体管，比iPhone12的A14仿生处理器使用的118亿个晶体管大幅增加。这使得苹果将中央处理核心的数量从6个增加到8个。M1有四个高性能内核，用于重负荷工作，四个高效率内核，用于低优先级任务。
与iPhone和iPad芯片一样，M1也有图形和人工智能处理的专用电路。
性能对Mac芯片的转型至关重要，它会影响Mac买家是热情接受新机型，还是暂时观望，甚至是购买搭载英特尔(Intel)新虎湖(Tiger Lake)芯片的Windows电脑。随着冠状病毒的流行引发了个人电脑销量的激增，现在是苹果试图吸引尽可能多客户的黄金时期。
良好的性能还意味着，苹果用于在苹果硅机上运行英特尔Mac软件的Rosetta技术在芯片过渡期间更有用。
苹果首席执行官蒂姆·库克(Tim Cook)在6月份的苹果全球开发者大会(WWDC Developer)上宣布了苹果硅片的变化。但它已经酝酿多年，有关基于ARM的Mac电脑的传言可以追溯到2012年。
MacBook Air的起价为999美元，而较小的Mac Mini的起价为699美元--分析师认为苹果的芯片对苹果来说比英特尔更便宜，因此100美元的降价可能更容易被证明是合理的。
尊重他人，保持文明礼貌，不离题。我们删除违反我们政策的评论，我们鼓励您阅读这些评论。我们可以随时关闭讨论线程。
note_en:
This story is part of  Apple Event, our full coverage of the latest news from Apple headquarters.      Apple's next-generation Macs will use a new chip called the M1, a big brother to the A-series chips in its iPhone 12, that Apple says will bring new power and battery life to its personal computers.
 The company's goal for the chip was "industry leading performance and features while relentlessly focusing on performance efficiency," Apple's senior vice president of hardware technologies, Johny Srouji, said at an   Apple launch event Tuesday.
  Subscribe to the CNET Now newsletter for our editors' picks of the most important stories of the day.
 In the MacBook Air, the M1 helps give a battery life good for "up to" 15 hours for web browsing and 18 hours of video. Processor speed is 3.5 times faster than the previous Intel-based model, while graphics is 5 times faster, Apple said. The new 13-inch MacBook Pro is up to 3 times faster than the best-selling Intel machine, Apple said.
 The processor has 16 billion transistors, a substantial increase from the 11.8 billion used in the iPhone 12's A14 Bionic. That lets Apple increase the number of central processing cores from six to eight. The M1 has four high-performance cores for heavy-duty work and four high-efficiency cores for low-priority tasks.
     Like the iPhone and iPad chips, the M1 also has dedicated circuitry for graphics and and artificial intelligence processing.
  Performance is crucial to the Mac chip transition, influencing whether Mac buyers embrace the new models enthusiastically, sit things out for a while, or even buy a Windows machine powered by  Intel's new Tiger Lake chips. With the coronavirus pandemic triggering a PC sales surge, it's prime time for Apple to try to lure as many customers as possible.
                                             Good performance also means that Apple's Rosetta technology, for running Intel Mac software on Apple silicon machines, is more useful during the chip transition.
 Apple Chief Executive  Tim Cook announced the Apple silicon change at Apple's WWDC developer event in June. But it's been in the works for years, with rumors of  Arm-based Macs extending back to 2012.
 The MacBook Air starts at $999, while the smaller Mac Mini starts at $699 -- a $100 price cut that's likely easier could have been easier to justify by analysts' expectation that Apple's chips are less expensive for Apple than Intel's.
  Be respectful, keep it civil and stay on topic. We delete comments that violate  our policy, which we encourage you to read. Discussion threads can be closed at any time at our discretion.
title: 苹果新款Mac芯片M1
title_en: Apple's new Mac chip, the M1

note:
经过多年的期待和在2020年WWDC大会上的嘲讽，苹果公司的第一款基于ARM的Mac处理器终于问世了。5纳米M1片上系统(SoC)配备了8核CPU，该公司声称这是市场上所有处理器中性能功耗比最好的，以及多达8个GPU核心。这些CPU核心被划分为高性能和高效率的核心。考虑到这一设计，该公司目前的A14 Soc采用了六核设计，只有高性能的内核可供使用。但与A14非常相似的是，M1包括一个每秒可完成11万亿次运算的16核神经引擎。
该公司表示，在MacBook Air的散热外壳内，M1的性能最高可达传统PC芯片的两倍。说到显卡，苹果声称M1是市场上所有集成GPU中性能最好的。它还内置了对迅雷4、PCI Express Gen 4和NVMe存储的支持。此外，该芯片具有通用存储架构、用于对媒体进行编码和解码的专用引擎，以及确保信息安全的安全飞地。
在实践中，M1应该会带来显著的性能和能效提升。例如，苹果公司表示，凭借新款MacBook Air，M1使这款笔记本一次充电可以提供长达15小时的无线网络和18小时的视频播放。相比之下，目前英特尔驱动的机型在这些使用案例中承诺最多使用11到12个小时。
根据该公司的说法，它已经优化了所有的第一方应用程序，以利用M1，并在所有方面都有了重大的性能改进。例如，Final Cut在M1上的运行速度是以前x86处理器上的6倍。此外，iOS和iPadOS应用程序在新的硅片上原生运行。像Adobe这样的开发者将在今年晚些时候更新他们的应用程序，以利用M1。与此同时，苹果的新Mac电脑将搭载Rosetta 2，它将翻译现有的基于x86的应用程序，以便它们可以在M1 Mac电脑上运行。
note_en:
After years of anticipation and a  tease at WWDC 2020, Apple’s first ARM-based Mac processor is here. The 5nm M1 system-on-a-chip (SoC) features an 8-core CPU, which the company claims delivers the best performance-per-watt of any processor on the market, and up to 8 GPU cores. Those CPUs cores are divided up into high-performance and efficiency cores. To put that design in context, the company’s current  A14 Soc features a six-core design with only high-performance cores at its disposal. But much like the A14, M1 includes a 16-core Neural Engine that can complete 11 trillion operations per second.
 The company says M1 can deliver up to two times the performance of a traditional PC chip within the thermal envelope of a MacBook Air. When it comes to graphics, Apple claims M1 delivers the best performance of any integrated GPU on the market. There’s also built-in support for Thunderbolt 4, PCI Express Gen 4 and NVMe storage. In addition, the chip features a universal memory architecture, dedicated engines for encoding and decoding media, as well as a secure enclave to keep your information safe.
  In practice, M1 should deliver significant performance and energy efficiency gains. With the new  MacBook Air, for instance, Apple says M1 enables the laptop to offer up to 15 hours of wireless web and 18 hours of video playback on a single charge. By contrast, the current  Intel-powered model promises up 11 and 12 hours in those use cases.
  According to the company, it has optimized all of its first-party apps to take advantage of M1, with major performance improvements across the board. For instance, Final Cut works six times faster on M1 than on previous x86 processors. Moreover, iOS and iPadOS apps run natively on the new silicon. Developers like Adobe will update their apps to take advantage of M1 later this year. In the meantime, Apple’s new Macs will ship with Rosetta 2, which will translate existing x86-based apps so that they can run on M1 Macs.
title: M1是第一款用于Mac的苹果硅芯片
title_en: M1 is the first Apple Silicon chip for the Mac

note:
在推出搭载英特尔(Intel)处理器的Mac电脑15年后，苹果公司(Apple)宣布了其首款Mac电脑的细节，该电脑放弃了英特尔(Intels)CPU，转而采用苹果设计的基于ARM的芯片，被称为苹果硅(Apple Silicon)。苹果公司宣布，首款苹果Silicon Mac将是搭载M1的13&34；Macbook Air，这是一款完全无风扇、安静的设计。
新的Macbook Air将不会配备苹果M1处理器，这是iPad Pro推出的一系列更高性能的ARM CPU中的最新一款。M1是一款基于5纳米制程设计的8核CPU，采用统一内存架构，提供高带宽、低延迟的内存访问。在其8个内核中，有4个是针对要求苛刻的前台任务的高性能内核，还有4个是低功耗、高效率的内核，旨在以较低的功耗和散热成本完成要求较低的后台任务。
苹果公司表示，M1提供了最高的性能功耗比，当运行功率为10瓦时，性能是x86笔记本电脑CPU的两倍，在更高的性能水平上，功耗是x86笔记本电脑CPU的四分之一。M1还配备了带有128个执行单元(EU)的8核GPU。与最新的PC芯片相比，苹果在M1的GPU上显示出了类似的性能功耗比曲线--但由于这款最新的芯片没有指明名字，所以目前还不清楚这款芯片是否包括英特尔创纪录的Iris Xe显卡，就像虎湖笔记本电脑的CPU一样。
由于Apple Silicon基于与英特尔(X86)不同的架构(ARM)，因此这款Mac本身不会运行在之前基于英特尔的Mac上运行的应用程序。话虽如此，许多应用程序--包括苹果公司开发的所有应用程序--都会有ARM专用的二进制文件，苹果公司声称，对于许多Mac开发者来说，编译他们自己的二进制文件相对容易。此外，与其他即将推出的Apple Silicon Mac一样，搭载M1的苹果MacBook Air将能够运行使用Rosetta 2的x86 MacOS应用程序。
这个故事正在发展。请查看或关注我们的直播博客，了解更多宣布细节。
note_en:
After 15 years shipping Mac computers with Intel processors, Apple has announced details about its first Mac to forgo Intels' CPUs in favor of Apple-designed, ARM-based chips dubbed Apple Silicon. Apple announced that the first Apple Silicon Mac will be the 13" Macbook Air with M1, a completely fanless and silent design.
  The new Macbook Air will feature the Apple M1 CPU, which is the latest in a line of higher-performance ARM CPUs introduced with the iPad Pro. M1 is a an 8-core CPU built on a 5nm process design, and features unified memory architecture, offering high-bandwidth low-latency memory access. Of its 8 cores, four are higher-performance aimed at demanding foreground tasks, and four are lower-power, higher-efficiency designed to complete less-demanding background tasks at a decreased power and thermal cost.
 Apple says that the M1 offers the highest performance per watt, with double the performance of an x86 laptop CPU when running at 10 watts—and 1/4 the power draw of an x86 laptop CPU at higher performance levels. M1 also features an 8-core GPU with 128 execution units (EUs). Apple shows a similar performance-per-watt curve for the M1's GPU compared to "the latest PC chip"—but since that latest chip was not specified by name, it's unclear whether that includes Intel's record-breaking Iris Xe graphics, as seen in Tiger Lake laptop CPUs.
 Because Apple Silicon is based on a different architecture (ARM) than Intel (x86), this Mac will not natively run applications that worked on previous, Intel-based Macs. That said, many applications—including all Apple-developed applications—will have ARM-specific binaries, and Apple claims it will be relatively easy for many Mac developers to compile their own. Also, like other upcoming Apple Silicon Macs, the MacBook Air with M1 will be able to run x86 macOS applications using Rosetta 2.
 This story is developing. Check back or  follow our liveblog for more details as they are announced.
title: 第一款搭载Apple Silicon的基于ARM的Mac是搭载M1的Macbook Air
title_en: The first ARM-based Mac with Apple Silicon is Macbook Air with M1

note:
安迪·阿雷蒂奥是早期基金TheVentureCity的合伙人，这是一种新的创业和加速模式，帮助不同的创始人实现全球影响力。
创始人在筹集资金时往往会犯一系列经典错误。第一个错误(和第二个错误)是筹集了错误的金额，并在错误的时间做了这件事。这种双重打击导致创始人被过早稀释，或者没有筹集到足够的资金进入下一个融资阶段。
他们也可能过早地把所有鸡蛋放在一个篮子里。我犯了那个错误。我签署了一份250万欧元首轮融资的条款说明书(一份不具约束力的协议)，通过了尽职调查程序，投资委员会也批准了这笔交易。但在最后一刻，我的帽子桌上的一位天使的声明让这位潜在投资者改变了主意。在Point Nine Capital的一项调查中，创始人们表示，筹集风险资本的两个最大压力因素是，不知道自己在融资过程中处于什么位置，以及不理解风投为什么拒绝了他们的提议。
另一方面，如果你知道什么是风投，你就会做好准备，知道你的目标是哪种投资者个性，最重要的是--从长远来看，你会优化你的股权价值。统计研究显示，成功筹集更多风投资金的创始人，在IPO时最终会拥有更多价值更高的公司股份。学习的曲线是陡峭的；你不仅要把风险投资作为一个行业来研究，还要把个人投资者本身作为研究对象。因此，我决定分享一些我希望自己在创业公司创始人追逐风险投资时就知道的关于风险投资的主要经验。
1.这不是筹集资金的问题，而是在正确的时间筹集适当数额的问题。
初创公司都要达到两个里程碑：(A)产品/市场契合度和(B)盈利、可重复和可扩展的增长模式。一旦这两个转折点出现，创业公司的风险就会大大降低，这通常会反映在估值上。作为一名早期创始人，如果你想保护自己的所有权，请确保在估值较低的时候筹集少量资金。
把你的钱存起来，直到你把创业初期的风险降下来。然后，当你最终有确凿证据证明你有很强的产品/市场契合度和清晰的增长模式时，积极提高。当你的公司发展到那个阶段并成为规模企业时，一定要明白这一点。你不会想成为一名成功筹集了首轮融资、但所有权很少、前面的路很长的创始人。
有时候，时机不在你的掌握之中。初创企业的股权价格由资本供求决定。投资者自己必须从另一种名为有限合伙人(LPs)的投资者那里筹集资金，有限合伙人可能持有各种资产的股份。如果有限合伙人对风险资产有浓厚的兴趣，就会有更多的资本供应，初创企业股权的价格就会上升。但事实恰恰相反。如果你看一看美国最近的两次衰退(2000年和2008年)，你会发现股市崩盘恰逢风险投资市场的估值出现修正。
因此，当“市场”对你的股权有强烈的胃口时，要有战略眼光，并进行融资；否则，就伸展你的跑道，等待合适的时机。目前，初创企业将下一次加薪推迟到2021年是很常见的，他们希望看到更强劲的势头。
地点：告诉我你在哪里，我会告诉你能筹到多少钱。
我认为初创企业融资有两个条件：(A)能够证明大规模退出是合理的大市场，(B)大型风投基金(小型基金不需要大规模退出才能成功)。
假设第一个条件得到满足，我们从哪里可以找到那些庞大的风投基金？通常情况下，他们会在靠近大型市场的地方，有相当大的退出记录。
note_en:
Andy Areitio is a partner at the early-stage fund  TheVentureCity, a new venture and acceleration model that helps diverse founders achieve global impact.
  Founders tend to make a series of classic mistakes when raising funding. Error number one (and two) is to raise the wrong amount of money and to do it at the wrong time. This double whammy results in founders being very diluted too early or not raising enough money to reach the next funding stage.
 They can also put all their eggs in one basket too early. I made that mistake. I had signed a term-sheet (a nonbinding agreement) for a €2.5 million Series A round, passed the due diligence process, and the investment committee had approved the deal. But at the very last minute, a claim from one of the angels on my cap table made the prospect investor change his mind. In a Point Nine Capital survey,  founders said that the two most stressful elements of raising venture capital are not knowing where in the fundraising process they are and not understanding why VCs have rejected their proposal.
 On the other hand, if you know what VCs all about, you’ll be geared up for the ride, know the kind of investor personality you’re aiming for, and crucially — you’ll optimize the value of your equity in the long run. Founders who manage to raise more VC funds end up having a  greater value stake in their company when the time comes to IPO, according to statistical research. The learning curve is steep; you’re not just studying VC as an industry, but the individual investors themselves. So, I’ve decided to share the main lessons about VC that I wish I’d known when I was a startup founder chasing venture capital.
 1. It’s not about raising, it’s about raising the right amount at the right time
 Startups are all about reaching two milestones: (a)  product/market fit and (b) a  profitable, repeatable and scalable growth model. Once those two corners are turned, the risk of a startup decreases enormously, which is normally reflected in the valuation. As an early-stage founder, if you want to protect your ownership, make sure you’re raising small amounts of money while your valuations are low.
 Save your cash until you de-risk your early-stage startup. Then, raise aggressively when you finally have hard evidence that you have a strong product/market fit and a clear growth model. Be sure you understand when your company reaches that stage and  becomes a scaleup. You don’t want to be a founder that has successfully raised a Series A round but has very little ownership and a very long road ahead.
 Sometimes, the timing is out of your hands. The price of equity in startups is governed by the supply and demand of capital. Investors themselves have to raise money from another type of investor called  Limited Partners (LPs), who may hold stakes in a variety of assets. If LPs have a strong interest in VC assets, there is more supply of capital and the price of startup equity will rise. But the opposite is also true. If you take a look at the last two recessions in the United States (2000 and 2008), you will see that the stock market crash coincided with corrections to valuations in the VC market.
 So, be strategic and raise when “the market” has a strong appetite for your equity; otherwise, stretch your runway and wait for the right time. Right now, it’s common to see startups postponing their next raise to 2021, looking for stronger winds.
 2. Location: Tell me where you are and I’ll tell you how much you’ll raise
 I see two conditions for startups to raise a large round: (a) a large market that can justify a sizable exit, and (b) a large VC fund (small funds don’t need super sizable exits to be successful).
 Assuming the first condition is met, where can we find those large VC funds? Typically, they’ll be in locations close to large markets, with a track record of sizable exits.
title: 当我还是一名创始人的时候，我希望自己对风险投资有所了解
title_en: What I wish I’d known about venture capital when I was a founder

note:
他说：“我们制造苹果硅已经有十多年的历史了。它是iPhone、iPad和Apple Watch的核心，现在我们想把它带到Mac上，这样Mac就可以凭借Apple Silicon令人难以置信的性能、定制技术和行业领先的能效实现巨大的飞跃。
M1将配备4个高性能内核和4个高效率内核，遵循ARM芯片长期以来的标准。
苹果辩称，M1是其迄今性能最高的芯片，其性能与目前基于英特尔(Intel)的双核Macbook Air差不多(不过，公平地说，这并不是一款高性能的机器)。也许更重要的是，这些芯片还提供了比其他系统更好的性能功耗比。
在GPU方面，M1将配备多达8个内核和128个执行单元。它将能够处理多达24,576个并发线程，峰值性能为2.6万亿次浮点。苹果公司认为，这使其成为世界上最快的笔记本电脑集成图形体验。
正如预期的那样，该芯片还将配备苹果的神经引擎，以加快机器学习的工作量。
苹果今年早些时候出货的首批开发者产品采用A12Z芯片，A12Z芯片是今年早些时候在2020年iPad Pro中首次亮相的A12芯片的变种。看起来苹果并没有真的为其所谓的“开发者过渡工具包”(Developer Transition Kit)修改八核A12Z芯片，但即便没有这样做，这些开发者工具包的性能也达到了与入门级MacBook Air相当的水平。
虽然苹果显然已经修改了这款芯片的设计，以适应自己的目的，但值得注意的是，ARM自己在过去几年里一直在构建服务器和台式机/笔记本电脑芯片的IP产品组合。在笔记本电脑方面，它取得了一些胜利，微软将部分Surface设备押在了ARM上，但总的来说，这仍然是一个利基市场。然而，在服务器领域，ARM已经清楚地表明，它能够为合作伙伴提供正确的设计，以正确的功率和性能权衡来制造芯片。
note_en:
“We’ve been making Apple Silicon for more than a decade. It’s at the heart of iPhone, iPad, and Apple Watch – and now we want to bring it to the Mac, so the Mac can take a huge leap forward with the incredible performance, custom technologies and industry-leading power efficiency of Apple Silicon,” Apple said.
 The M1 will feature 4 high-performance cores and 4 high-efficiency cores, following what has long become the standard for Arm chips.
  Apple argues that the M1 is its highest-performance chip yet and delivers similar performance to its current Intel-based dual-core Macbook Air (though to be fair, that’s not a performance machine by any stretch). Maybe more importantly, these chips also offer a better performance per watt than other systems.
 On the GPU side, the M1 will feature up to eight cores with 128 execution units. It’ll be able to handle up  24,576 concurrent threads and peak performance of 2.6 teraflops. This, Apple argues, makes it the world’s fasted integrated graphics experience on a laptop.
 As expected, the chip will also feature Apple’s neural engine for accelerating machine learning workloads.
  The first set of developer units that Apple shipped out earlier this year were powered by the A12Z chip, a variant of the A12 that made it debut in the 2020 iPad Pro earlier this year. It doesn’t look like Apple really modified that eight-core A12Z chip for its so-called ‘Developer Transition Kit,’ but even without doing so, these developer kits also hit performance levels comparable with an entry-level MacBook Air.
 And while Apple has obviously modified this chip design to suit its own purposes, it’s worth noting that Arm itself has spent  the last few years building an IP portfolio of server- and desktop/laptop-ready chips. On the laptop side, it had a few wins, with Microsoft betting on Arm for some of its Surface devices, but overall, this remains a niche market. In the server space, though, Arm has clearly shown that it is able to offer its partners the right designs to build chips with the right power and performance tradeoffs.
title: 苹果公司宣布推出其Apple Silicon系列的第一款芯片M1
title_en: Apple announces the M1, the first chip in its Apple Silicon family

note:
这是官方的。首款搭载苹果自家硅片的MacBook在这里问世。一直以来最受欢迎的轻薄机型即将问世，它采用的是该公司新推出的M1芯片--这是该公司首款内部制造的台式CPU。该系统看起来与上几代Air基本相同，大多数重大变化都发生在引擎盖下。
根据苹果公司的数据，该系统的速度应该是以前型号的3.5倍，比去年销售的98%的个人电脑笔记本电脑都要快。更值得注意的是，新的基于ARM的芯片意味着它可以在没有风扇的情况下运行。该公司长期以来一直声称，电池效率是其新芯片的最大好处之一，这一点似乎肯定得到了证实，据称一次充电可实现15小时的网页浏览和18小时的视频播放。如果这是真的，那也是巨大的，而且比早期机型的12小时声明有了很大的提升。
note_en:
It’s official. The first MacBook to sport Apple’s own silicon is here. The perennial favorite thin and light is on the way, featuring the company’s new M1 chip — it’s first desktop CPU built in-house. The system looks to be largely identical to the last several generations of Air, with most of the big changes happening under the hood.
 Per Apple’s numbers, the system should be 3.5x faster than earlier models and faster than 98% of the PC laptops sold in the last year. Even more notable, the new ARM-based chip means it can operate without a fan. The company has long claimed that battery efficiency is one of the biggest benefits to its new chip, and that certainly seems to be came here, with a claimed 15 hours of web browsing and 18 hours of video playback on a charge. Huge if true, and a big bump from the 12 hour claims for earlier models.
title: 这是一款售价999美元的新款MacBook Air，由苹果硅片驱动
title_en: This is the new $999 MacBook Air, powered by Apple silicon

note:
苹果公司推出了新的M1芯片，这将为其基于ARM的新一代Mac电脑提供动力。这是一个5纳米的处理器，就像为最新iPhone提供动力的A14仿生处理器一样。
苹果公司表示，新处理器将专注于能效。它有一个8核的CPU，苹果公司说这是世界上每瓦特CPU性能最好的。苹果公司表示，它的峰值性能相当于普通笔记本电脑CPU的四分之一功耗。该公司表示，这款机型拥有世界上速度最快的四个CPU核心，再配上四个高效率的核心。
它与高达8核的GPU和16核的神经引擎配对，苹果声称GPU提供了世界上最快的集成显卡。此外，M1处理器具有通用内存架构、USB 4控制器、媒体编码和解码引擎以及大量安全功能。其中包括硬件验证的安全引导、加密和运行时保护。
苹果公司声称，该芯片可以让Mac立即从睡眠模式中唤醒，甚至在运行3D程序或编辑原始照片时也能提供良好的性能。
苹果公司表示，它已经针对新处理器优化了所有应用程序。苹果公司表示，Final Cut Pro的速度最高可达6倍，Logic Pro处理的音频曲目量最高可达3倍。苹果公司表示，来自Adobe等第三方供应商的应用程序也将陆续推出。Lightroom将于今年晚些时候推出，Photoshop将于明年推出。
苹果正在为没有针对新处理器优化的应用程序提供Rosetta 2翻译软件，现有的iOS和iPadOS应用程序也将在新处理器上本地运行。
正在开发的…。我们在这篇文章中添加了更多内容，但你可以关注我们的苹果“还有一件事”直播博客，以更快的速度获取新闻。
note_en:
Apple has introduced the new M1 chip that will power its new generation of Arm-based Macs. It’s a 5nm processor, just like the A14 Bionic powering its latest iPhones.
 Apple says the new processor will focus on power efficiency. It has an eight-core CPU, which Apple says offers the world’s best performance per watt of an CPU. Apple says it delivers the same peak performance as a typical laptop CPU at a quarter of the power draw. It says this has four of the world’s fastest CPUs cores, paired with four high-efficiency cores.
 It pairs this with up to an eight-core GPU, which Apple claims offers the world’s fastest integrated graphics, and a 16-core Neural Engine. In addition, the M1 processor has a universal memory architecture, a USB 4 controller, media encode and decode engines, and a host of security features. These include hardware-verified secure boot, encryption, and run-time protections.
   Apple claims the chip allows the Mac to instantly wake from sleep mode, and offer good performance even when running 3D programs or editing RAW photos.
 Apple says it’s optimized all of its apps for the new processors. Final Cut Pro is up to six times faster, Apple says, and Logic Pro can handle up to three times the amount of audio tracks. Apps from third party providers like Adobe are also coming, Apple says. Lightroom will launch later this year, with Photoshop following next year.
 Apple is offering Rosetta 2 translation software for apps not optimized for the new processors, and existing iOS and iPadOS apps will also run natively on the new processors.
 Developing… we’re adding more to this post, but you can follow along with our   Apple “One More Thing” live blog  to get the news even faster.
title: 苹果发布第一款苹果Mac硅SoC M1，采用5纳米制程、16B晶体管、8核CPU、最高8核GPU和16核神经引擎
title_en: Apple announces M1, the first Apple Silicon SoC for Macs, with 5nm process, 16B transistors, 8-core CPU, up to 8-core GPU, and a 16-core neural engine

note:
苹果公司今天在发布会上发布了首批Apple Silicon Mac电脑，这标志着Intel Inside Apple笔记本电脑和台式机时代的终结。基于ARM的苹果硅芯片家族中的第一个芯片被称为苹果M1芯片。
与单独的CPU、GPU、RAM和其他组件相比，这在使用M1的Mac计算机上提供了更快的性能。
M1还吹捧更高的能效和更高的使用性能，每瓦性能提高3倍。
MacBook Air将是第一款从英特尔转用基于ARM的新款Apple Silicon M1芯片的苹果笔记本电脑。点击此处了解更多信息：苹果推出搭载Apple Silicon M1芯片的全新MacBook Air。

note_en:
Apple is unveiling its first Apple Silicon Macs today at its event that marks the beginning of the end of Intel inside Apple notebooks and desktops. The first in a family of Apple Silicon chips based on ARM is called the Apple M1 chip.
   This affords faster performance on Mac computers using M1 versus separate CPU, GPU, RAM, and other components
 M1 also touts better power efficiency with higher performance during usage with 3x performance per watt
    MacBook Air will be the first Apple notebook to switch from Intel to the new ARM-based Apple Silicon M1 chip. Learn more here:  Apple unveils all-new MacBook Air powered by Apple Silicon M1 chip

title: 苹果推出第一款用于便携式Mac电脑的片上系统M1
title_en: Apple unveils M1, its first system-on-a-chip for portable Mac computers
